HomePage.title: Attirebella - Gracefully showcasing traditional and modern attire
HomePage.description: Discover a world of timeless elegance and timeless fashion

logoutPage.title: You have been logged out
logoutPage.description: Thank you for visiting! We hope to see you again soon.

signinPage.title: Welcome Back!
signinPage.description: Sign in to unlock a shopping experience tailored just for you.
signinPage.signUpAction: Don't have an account? click here...

signupPage.title: Sign Up
signupPage.description: Please enter your details to create an account with us for faster checkout and order tracking.
signupPage.buttonTextSignIn: Already have an account? Sign In

dashboardPage.title: Dashboard
dashboardPage.description: Keep track of your orders, get the latest updates on new arrivals, and explore personalized fashion picks just for you.

addressPage.title: Your saved addresses
addressPage.description: Add new addresses, edit existing ones, or set a default address to speed up your checkout. Keeping your details updated ensures faster and smoother deliveries.

securityPage.title: Security Settings
securityPage.description: Keep your account safe by updating your password regularly.

profilePage.title: Profile
profilePage.description: Update your name, contact info keep your account up to date.
profilePage.profilePicText: Add a profile picture to make your account feel more like you.
profilePage.basicFormEditDOBError: Please enter a valid date of birth.
profilePage.basicFormEditDOBTooltip: Your date of birth is needed for account security and to help us personalize your experience.
profilePage.basicFormEditGenderTooltip: Your gender is needed for account security and to help us personalize your experience.
profilePage.basicFormEditGenderHelperText: Select Gender for account security and to help us personalize your experience.
profilePage.basicFormEditEmailTooltip: The email address you use to sign in to your account.
profilePage.basicFormEditPhoneTooltip: The phone number is required to verify your account.
profilePage.phoneValidationError: Phone number must be exactly {count} digits

access-denied.title: Access Denied
access-denied.description: You must be logged in to view this page. Redirecting to sign-in...
